mapper.select: SELECT c.pid, c.uid, c.statid, s.statNm, c.location, c.title, c.regdate, u.usertypeid FROM community c INNER JOIN users u ON c.uid=u.id LEFT JOIN station s ON c.statid=s.statId WHERE u.usertypeid=200 ORDER BY c.pid DESC
